mapper.select: select msg_from,msg_to,msg_content,msg_read,to_char(msg_no) as MSG_NO,msg_date from msg where ((msg_from = #{msg_from} and msg_to = #{msg_to}) or (msg_to = #{msg_from} and msg_from = #{msg_to})) and msg_no > to_number(#{msg_no}) order by msg_date
mapper.update: update msg set msg_read = 1 where (msg_from=#{msg_to} and msg_to = #{msg_from})
mapper.select: select count(msg_read) as msg_count from msg where msg_to=#{mem_id} and msg_read = 0
select * from msg where msg_no in (select max(msg_no) from msg where msg_to = #{mem_id} or msg_from = #{mem_id} group by msg_from,msg_to)
select count(msg_read) as MSG_READ from msg where msg_from = #{fri_id} and msg_to=#{mem_id} and msg_read=0
